attributes.action: block the remainers of our eu vote from getting a 2nd vote
attributes.additional_details: i voted out along with millions of others,and we shouldnt be put through this again after waiting so long for this to happen.our childrens and granchildrens future relies on us. sign this petition to stop any kind of back tracking on our overwhelming win to take back our country and make brtian GREAT again.thank you
attributes.background: over 17 million people voted for brexit and won,but now the 16 million who voted to stay are  petitioning for a rematch. the pm said one go and one go only,yet remainers have disregarded this. lets block them and dont give in to sore loosers
